name: leveljs.org
description: This is the source code for [leveljs.org](leveljs.org).
author: hij1nx

scripts.git-co: git checkout gh-pages && git reset --hard origin/master
scripts.prep: npm run build-styles && npm run build-pug && cp -r ./assets/static/* . && echo leveljs.org > CNAME
scripts.git-push: git push origin gh-pages --force && git checkout master
scripts.deploy: npm run git-co && npm run prep && npm run git-commit && npm run git-push
